My mother described being in Hitler youth as being wholesome and fun. Everyone of a certain age was in it. It gave structure to lesiure time, much like the Boy Scouts or Girl Guides do.
They went camping and played music and dressed smartly. Durng adult life she had quite a nostalgia for that period,  up to about 1940. Then it all went pear-shaped.

Cardinal Rat, aka the current Pope, was also a member of the Hitler Youth long before he became the chief racketeer for the biggest child molestation organization in human history. He would find this humanization of Nazi's heartwarming.
